thread.title: Mourinho cagey in post-match interview, possible dig at referee [Video]
thread.title_full: Mourinho cagey in post-match interview, possible dig at referee [Video]

title: Mourinho cagey in post-match interview, possible dig at referee [Video]
text:
Mourinho cagey in post-match interview, possible dig at referee [Video] By Scott Morris on Wednesday, February 1, 2017 Not a happy bunny 
Jose Mourinho has been left to answer questions over another disappointing performance against Hull in a week, drawing 0-0. 
The Manchester United manager had to watch his side draw with the Tigers as their rivals began to pull away from them. 
Mourinho began his post-match press duties extremely cagey, giving short and evasive answers. 
The Portuguese manager went on to explain that they just couldn’t score, that was their downfall. 
When asked on refereeing decisions, that is what caught the eye and ear of most viewers. 
Following a question over a controversial refereeing decision, Jose responded in typical Mourinho fashion. 
“If you don’t know football, you shouldn’t be here with a microphone in your hand” he said, in what could have been a dig at the referee. United fans lash out at team 
Following the disappointing defeat, Red Devil’s fans took to twitter to describe their disappointment. 
The fans aimed criticism at Mourinho, the team and the clubs mentality as their rivals pull away at the top. Loading tags...
